name: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
info:
• 简体中文名: 华纳兄弟互动娱乐
  • 别名: 華納兄弟互動娛樂
  • 别名: WB Games
  • 生日: 2004年1月14日
  • 官方网站: http://www.wbgames.com/
detail: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment (also known as WB Games) is the video game production arm of Warner Bros., and a publisher, developer, licensor and distributor of entertainment content for the interactive space across all platforms, including console, handheld, mobile and PC-based gaming for both internal and third party game titles.

works.name: LEGO DC Super-Villains / 乐高DC超级反派
